keyword: calories in a in n out cheeseburger
title: Calories in an In-N-Out Cheeseburger
meta_description: Discover calories in a in n out cheeseburger: about 480 kcal, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, and tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out cheeseburger: beef patty, American cheese, sesame bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and exact preparation. Values based on official In-N-Out data; check app or menu for updates.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out cheeseburger contains 480 calories with 22 g protein and 27 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Protein style (lettuce wrap instead of bun)
Animal style (extra spread, grilled onions, mustard-fried patty)

faqs.q: How many calories in a in n out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 calories for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: About 22 g of protein per cheeseburger.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Yes, around 39 g carbs, mostly from the bun and spread.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
Can I make an In-N-Out cheeseburger lower calorie?
faqs.a: Opt for protein style to cut ~180 kcal by swapping the bun for lettuce.
